byline.contributor: Charles Mangwiro contributed reporting from Maputo, Mozambique.

lead_paragraph: Villagers in a remote part of the African country had been trying to siphon fuel from the vehicle when it was struck by lightning.
snippet: Villagers in a remote part of the African country had been trying to siphon fuel from the vehicle when it was struck by lightning....

headline.main: Fuel Truck Explosion Kills at Least 73 in Mozambique
